      • getFile

        @Nullable
protected java.io.File getFile(java.lang.String urlSourceString,
                                         java.lang.String pathDest,
                                         java.lang.String nameDest)
        Parameters:
        urlSourceString - root url of the project: "https://server.tld/basedir/"
        pathDest - where to save downloaded file
        nameDest - name of the file to get (string is to urlSourceString and pathDest to obtain complete path
        Returns:
        return null if we are unable to grab the file, or the file directly. Made to be used with, repairMissingFiles(String, List) and grabJson(String, boolean) Intent("dlReceived", filename); getFile download a file from the project (Warning: NO CHECK: IT OVERWRITES FILES!) return null if no internet
